heading: HB01013
0: AN ACT MANDATING THE DEPARTMENT OF AGRICULTURE (DA) TO PROVIDE ADDITIONAL FUNDING FOR THE 'NATIONAL AGRI-FISHERY MECHANIZATION PROGRAM (NAFMP)' TO IMPROVE THE STATES AGRICULTURE AND FISHERIES SECTOR THROUGH MECHANIZATION, AND FOR OTHER PURPOSES
